entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 23. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023
